lord.of.rome

Class RomanLegion

  • java.lang.Object
    • lord.of.rome.DrawableObject
      • lord.of.rome.Creature
        • lord.of.rome.Fraction
          • lord.of.rome.RomanLegion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, Armed, Moveable

    public final class RomanLegion
extends Fraction
implements Armed
    Class that simulates the concept of roman empire legion. It can move, speak, fight and rescue attacked settlement. It dies when encounters barbarian horde fraction.
    Author:
    Carlos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • RomanLegion

        public RomanLegion()
        Default class constructor. It creates new roman legion and locates it in Rome as the beginning legion position.

      • RomanLegion

        private RomanLegion(int i)
        Private constructor used for creating cloned version of roman legion which could be added to some collections.
        Parameters:
        i - Not important. Used for distinguish from other constructors.

      • RomanLegion

        public RomanLegion(int width,
           int height)
        Public class constructor. It allows to put new roman legion in selected place of an empire map.
        Parameters:
        width - X parameter on empire map.
        height - y parameter on empire map.

      • rescueSettlement

        public void rescueSettlement(Place p,
                    Settlement s)
        Rescues target settlement from barbarian terror from given place.
        Parameters:
        p - Given beginning place, where actually is the roman legion.
        s - Target settlement to rescue from barbarian terror.
